content:
```text
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron plate smelting at position(4.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (4.0, -60.0). The furnace smelts iron ore into iron plates. An iron chest is located at position (4.5, -58.5)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items with missing ingredients
- Ensure that you have enough of all the required ingredients before attempting to craft an item. Specifically, ensure that you have enough iron plates before attempting to craft iron chests. Crafting iron plates using a furnace before crafting iron chests will solve this issue.

# NAMESPACE
```
